metadata.title: CVE-2021-44503 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to the YottaDB code base). Using crafted input, an attacker can cause a call to va_arg on an empty variadic parameter list, most likely causing a memory segmentation fault.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
